q1: Will Iceland ever make it to a World Cup final?
a1: Perhaps at some point in the distant future but probably not imminently. You never know, though!
q2: Will Iceland be able to prove their play skill at the UEFA Euro or not?
a2: Iceland will definitely be able to show their skill soon.
q3: Iceland have done really good to accomplish what they have
a3: I agree, Iceland does very well for their population size.
q4: With not that many household names, do you think Iceland has broken the mold of stacking up on Star power on the team?
q5: Who is Iceland's all time leading scorer?
a5: The all time scorer I can remember was Eidur Gudjohnsen, but that was back in the day.
